title: Peaceful, Tree-Lined Setting in the Heart of Houston
posting_body: ['Townhome Living in Uptown Houston, Easy Access to The Galleria, a Private Backyard Patio, Attached 2-car Garage', 'Large den/study, dramatic high ceilings, charming, arched windows & ample storage mean you always feel at home.', ' Sparkling swimming pool, wood burning fireplaces & luxury baths are features designed not only to make your life easy, but to make it luxurious.', "Built-In Shelves - Hardwood Floors - Wood-Burning Fireplaces -   Full-Size Washers and Dryers - Generous Dressing Closets - Porcelain Tile - 9' Ceilings - Crown Molding - 2-Tone Paint - Intrusion Alarms - Gourmet Kitchens - Spacious Pantries - Side-by-Side Refrigerators - 2-Way Exposures - Luxury Baths - Oversize Windows - Patios and Balconies -", 'Apt#4243A', '- Houston, TX, 77057', '2 bedroom', '$2,495', '/mo', '1,724', 'sf', 'Deposit:', '600', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats:Yes\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Dogs:Yes', 'Built:', '2000', 'Location:', 'Galleria/ Uptown', 'Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability', 'Community Amenities:', 'Perimeter fence, Hot Tub, Bus stop, Gated entrance, School bus stop, Pool', 'Unit Amenities:', 'W/D machines, Self-cleaning ovens, Miniblinds, Custom built-ins, Ceiling fans, Garbage disposals, Cable ready, Garden/large tubs, Fire places, Storage closet outside, Private patios/balconies, Dishwashers, Microwaves, Hi-speed internet, Walk-in closets, Ice makers, Attached garages, Custom carpet, Intrusion alarms', 'For more information about this community contact:', 'Mary Kay Noone\xa0\xa0(Agent)', 'Apartment Living Locators', 'show contact info', 'Refer to Apt#4243A', 's29027  a4243A  ad2361 i']
